bio: Lord Enma wields the powerful Enma Blade, a right of passage used by the Enma Family for generations.

soultimate.name: Hellish Enma Blade
soultimate.description: Hit foe with a barrage of hits for lots of damage.

skill.effect: Atk ↑ when attacking, 1% ↑ per hit, lasts 5 seconds.
skill.name: Enma Blade

name: Lord Enma (Blade)
